author: Daniel Kruger
title: Dollar Rises as Investors Analyze U.S. Tariff Effects
text:
The U.S. dollar rose Thursday, snapping a four-session streak of declines.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, climbed 0.4%, to 83.85. The dollar gained against the euro and the Canadian dollar.
Analysts said the dollarâ€™s gains came as investors are analyzing the potential impact of U.S. tariffs...
